message:
Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth to me, reflecting years of dedication and craftsmanship. I believe its true value surpasses $1500000, but I understand that the perceived value can vary greatly depending on the individual.

To make this offer more appealing and to ensure we find a mutually beneficial solution, I propose a negotiation process. Let's start with my initial offer of $1800000. This price reflects not only the tangible value of the product but also the intangible emotions and memories attached to it. I am open to discussing and adjusting this price based on your perspective and any counteroffers you might have.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you wish to provide a counteroffer. I am committed to finding a fair solution that respects both our interests.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice
